description.lang: Range Extender is a Z-Wave repeater device based on Z-Wave enhanced 232 slave library V6.51.10. It can extend the range of the communication between Z-Wave products and assist other devices to reach each other in your Z-Wave network. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network. It is a security Z-Wave plus device, so a security enabled controller is needed for take full advantage of all functionally for the Range Extender. It also supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.
The association group 1 is the Z-Wave Lifeline group. The Device Reset Locally Notification CC can be sent to the associated node in association group 1.
Set the partner ID of product.
Set a device tag for your Range Extender.
The available value range is 1 to 32767.
Reset the device to factory default.
Reset all configuration parameters to factory default settings
Reset the device to factory default.

description.lang: Set the default status ofthe LED when the Range Extender relays Z-Wave message
The Green LED will remain ON for 2 seconds.
